entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
